incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Multiple Networks over Multiple Countries in Africa

incident_updates.body:
We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays to Multiple Networks and Countries in Africa.
Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the Incidents for each affected Country. The following Countries and respective Network Operators are impacted:
- Tanzania: Viettel, TTCL
- Algeria: Mobilis
- Ivory Coast: MTN
- Guinea: Celcom
- Burundi: Viettel
- Libya: Al Madar

We will provide an update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Automated Alert: No Customer Impact

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the issue with SMS delivery delays towards United States Cellular Corp Network from a subset of short codes and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS delivery delays towards United States Cellular Corp Network from a subset of short codes. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Twilio SMS Delivery Delays to Claro Networks in the Dominican Republic Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS was degraded for 2 hours and 42 minutes between 11:00 and 13:42 Pacific Time on 5/13/2024. During this period of time, customers may have experienced Delivery Delays to Claro Networks in the Dominican Republic. The issue has now been resolved.
